page.title: 07Corston Reading Room
page.content: Corston and Rodbourne{Parish Hall and {Reading Room. The Parish hall and Reading room is used for lots of different functions. It was opened in 1904, and on the wall there is still a{list of rules}agreed upon at the time of opening. Here are some of the interesting ones: {No card playing nor gambling}be allowed in the room. {No intoxicating liquor}be allowed to be brought into the room. Any member not observing the rules or using objectionable language or behaving in a disorderly manner shall be deprived of membership. The room shall be opened for the {admission of men and boys only}on payment of sixpence a month and that no person be admitted under the age of fifteen years.
